headline: Incyte Announces FDA Approval of Monjuvi速 (tafasitamab-cxix) in Combination with Rituximab and Lenalidomide for Patients with Relapsed or Refractory Follicular Lymphoma
summary: WILMINGTON, Del., June 18, 2025--Incyte (Nasdaq:INCY) today announced that the U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) has approved Monjuvi速 (tafasitamab-cxix), a humanized Fc-modified cytolytic CD19-targeting monoclonal antibody, in combination with rituximab and lenalidomide for the treatment of adult patients with relapsed or refractory follicular lymphoma (FL).

headline: Incyte Lymphoma Treatment Gets FDA Approval
summary: By Kelly Cloonan Incyte said it received approval from the Food and Drug Administration for monjuvi, in combination with rituximab and lenalidomide, as a treatment for follicular lymphoma. ...
